text: Ne obroblyayete prokhannya kur'yera tomu shcho vy obroblyayete kozhni prokhannya inshykh. BOH znaye tsilkom ts sered vas shcho pidkradayetesya daleko vykorystovuyutʹ nestali probachennya. Dozvolʹte yim beware - tsey khto ne pidkoryayutʹsya yoho zamovam - dlya lykha mozhe vrazyty yikh, abo suvoryy retribution
